articles.title: New Englander Warren Zanes’s Springsteen book is now a film. Here’s what that means to him.
articles.description:
The once (and future?) Del Fuego talks fatherhood, human art in the age of AI, and watching his book land on screen.

The post New Englander Warren Zanes’s Springsteen book is now a film. Here’s what that means to him. appeared first on Boston.com.
